message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $110. It's a fair price considering the product's value and the effort I put into it.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product, but that's as high as I can go.

I'm glad we're getting closer to a deal, Bob. I can see you're really interested in the product, and I appreciate your willingness to pay a fair price. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to make a living. I can offer it to you for $105. It's the lowest I can go without losing money on the deal.

I understand that you're trying to make a living, Alice, and I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, $105 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product, and that's my final offer.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, and I'm glad we're getting close to a deal. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $100. I can offer it to you for $105 again, but this is my last compromise. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'll make sure to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal.
I appreciate your willingness to throw in some extras, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $102 for the product, and that's my final offer.
I'm not willing to go below $110, Bob. I've already compromised a lot and I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $110, but I'm not willing to go any lower. This is my final offer.

I understand that you're not willing to go any lower, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I've decided to stop negotiating and buy the product from John for $80. Thank you for the opportunity to negotiate with you, but I think I've found a better deal elsewhere.
